short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension monitors the cookies addition and deletion

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension monitors the cookies addition and deletion. You can give the domain, name and value in the form of regex pattern. It will monitor all those cookies and give you an alert whenever a change (add, delete or modify) done. It will alert you when you do change manually by add ons or via http requests.
